QuestData.Title: WANTED: Uvuros, Scourge of Shadowmoon
QuestData.Description: Wanted - DEAD:$B$BUvuros, scourge of Shadowmoon Valley.$B$BBy order of Overlord Or'barokh, the fel beast, Uvuros, is to be killed on sight and his mane stripped from his carcass as proof of deed. Return the fiery mane of the beast to Warcaller Sardon Truslice should you succeed.$B$BUvuros was last seen at the Hand of Gul'dan, located in the heart of Shadowmoon Valley - east of Shadowmoon Village.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Uvuros and recover Uvuros's Fiery Mane. Return it to Warcaller Sardon Truslice at Shadowmoon Village in Shadowmoon Valley.
QuestData.CompletionText: Here ta collect a reward, mon?
QuestData.RewardText: Quite da haul you got der, mon. Well done! An' ya be getting' yer reward. Don't ya worry!
